com.Cardinal.PMC.Forums

Class ThreadLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Cardinal.PMC.Forums.ThreadLoader

  • public class ThreadLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used for storing and loading instances of Thread objects.
    Author:
    Cardinal System

                                                    int amount)
                                             throws java.io.IOException
        Searches the given category for the given keywords.
        Parameters:
        search - search keywords.
        category - the category to search under.
        amount - the amount of threads to get.
        Returns:
        the unloaded threads.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - there was an error searching the forums.

      • getThread

        public Thread getThread(java.lang.String url)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the thread with the given URL. If the thread is not already loaded, load(String) will be invoked.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL of the thread to load.
        Returns:
        the Thread representation of the given thread.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - there was an error loading the thread.

      • hasThreadLoaded

        public boolean hasThreadLoaded(java.lang.String url)
        Checks to see if the given URL has been loaded into a Thread object.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL of the thread.
        Returns:
        true: the URL has been loaded into a thread.
        false: the URL has not been loaded.

        Will not load threads authored by the specified users.
        Parameters:
        usernames - the users to ignore.
        Returns:
        a loader that will ignore the specified users.
